FIELDS.title: Depart from DCA
FIELDS.subtitle: Flight leaves from DC at 09:35. Transfer at Toronto. 15:35 arrive at Haneda Airport.

FIELDS.title: Arrive at Haneda Airport
FIELDS.subtitle: Yay Japan! Get a SUICA (best) or Pasmo card and get on the the Keikyu Line to go to Tokyo.

FIELDS.title: Check-in: Tokyo Ginza Bay Capsule Hotel 東京銀座BAY HOTELのポイント 🛌
FIELDS.subtitle: Ginza is near the Nakagin Capsule Hotel

FIELDS.title: Get a McDonald's (Makudonarudo) Japan Menu Item 🍔
FIELDS.subtitle: Ginza

FIELDS.title: Buy Shinkansen ticket at Tokyo Station
FIELDS.subtitle: Ginza

FIELDS.title: Explore the Shibuya area 🛍️
FIELDS.subtitle: Shibuya Crossing and lots of Shopping.

FIELDS.title: Get a McDonald's (Makudonarudo) Japan Menu Item 🍔
FIELDS.subtitle: Shibuya

FIELDS.title: Visit Tsukiji Market 🐟
FIELDS.subtitle: Get sushi breakfast at the world's largest Fish Market (Opens: 5AM - 9AM).

FIELDS.title: Visit Sensō-ji Temple in Asakusa ⛩️
FIELDS.subtitle: Temple open Main hall: 6:00 to 17:00. Temple grounds: Always open.

FIELDS.title: Get Street Foods around Asakusa 🍡
FIELDS.subtitle: Lots of street food to sample around Sensō-ji Temple.

FIELDS.title: Get a McDonald's (Makudonarudo) Japan Menu Item 🍔
FIELDS.subtitle: Asaksa

FIELDS.title: Get Wifi Router from Wifi Rental Store
FIELDS.subtitle: The Wifi Rental Store is on the second floor. Hours: 9:30AM - 6:30PM (Weekdays Only)

FIELDS.title: Lunch at a Maid Cafe 💁
FIELDS.subtitle: Go to Akihabara for the Maid Cafe.

FIELDS.title: Visit a Cat Cafe 😺
FIELDS.subtitle: Akihabara has a few Cat Cafes. The best one is Cat Cafe MoCHA

FIELDS.title: Do some shopping in Akihabara 🛍️
FIELDS.subtitle: Souvenir: Coin wallet, pins, fridge magnet.

FIELDS.title: Get a McDonald's (Makudonarudo) Japan Menu Item 🍔
FIELDS.subtitle: Akihabara

FIELDS.title: Visit Fukagawa Edo Museum 🏛️
FIELDS.subtitle: Opens: 9:30AM - 5PM

FIELDS.title: Visit Tokyo Odaiba Oedo Onsen Monogatari ♨️
FIELDS.subtitle: Onsen (natural hotspring) with a Edo period theme park. For lunch, there's a Hello Kittie Cafe nearby (Cafe de Miki).

FIELDS.title: Visit Tokyo Skytree 📷
FIELDS.subtitle: The tallest tower in the world and the second tallest structure after the Burj Khalifa.

FIELDS.title: Visit Roppongi Hills Mori Garden Pond
FIELDS.subtitle: Roppongi Hills is a huge complex with shopping/dining/entertainment. Go to West Aoyama Garden (good pancakes)

FIELDS.title: Dinner at a Theme Restaurant in Shinjuku 🍴
FIELDS.subtitle: Alice in Fantasy Book (best)

FIELDS.title: Explore Tokyo's Nightlife 🍡
FIELDS.subtitle: Go to Izakaya restaurants in Golden Gai / Piss Alley

FIELDS.title: Travel to Mount Fuji by Bus 🚌
FIELDS.subtitle: Take the bus (depart at 12:45) from Shinjuku Expressway Bus Terminal to Kawaguchiko Station.

FIELDS.title: Check-in: Asafuji Ryokan hotel 富士河口湖温泉 ホテル あさふじ 🛌
FIELDS.subtitle: Check in by 6 PM. Pickup service from and to the Kawaguchiko Station

FIELDS.title: Hangout at and around the hotel 🛌 ♨️
FIELDS.subtitle: Public hot spring bath.

FIELDS.title: Check out areas around Mt. Fuji 📷
FIELDS.subtitle: Great View. Take lots of pictures.

FIELDS.title: Travel to Kyoto by Shinkansen 🚅
FIELDS.subtitle: Take Shinkansen (Bullet Train) from Tokyo Station. Buy a Icoca Card at Kyoto Station.

FIELDS.title: Get a Ekiben at Tokyo Station 🍱
FIELDS.subtitle: Ekiben is a bento for travelers sold at train stations

FIELDS.title: Check-in: Kyoto Guesthouse Lantern in Gion hotel らんたん祇園 🛌
FIELDS.subtitle: Gion is one of the Geisha Districts in Kyoto.

FIELDS.title: Have dinner in Gion 🍱
FIELDS.subtitle: Lots of good restaurants.

FIELDS.title: Visit Temples south of Gion ⛩️
FIELDS.subtitle: Kiyomizu-dera, Rengeoin Sanjusangen-do

FIELDS.title: Go to the best shrine in Kyoto ⛩️
FIELDS.subtitle: Fushimi-Inari-Taisha Shrine

FIELDS.title: Go to the second best shrine in Kyoto ⛩️
FIELDS.subtitle: Shimogamo-jinja shrine (second best shrine)

FIELDS.title: Explore Temples in Northern Higashiyama ⛩️
FIELDS.subtitle: Nanzenji Temple (open 8:40 am - 4:30 pm), the Philosopher's Path

FIELDS.title: Visit Nijo Castle 🏛️
FIELDS.subtitle: Nijō Castle (open 8:45AM - 5PM).

FIELDS.title: Explore Downtown Kyoto
FIELDS.subtitle: Nishiki Market. Pontocho Alley (another Geisha District)

FIELDS.title: Get Omurice 🍴
FIELDS.subtitle: Kichi Kichi Omurice

FIELDS.title: Explore Gion and Food Culture 🍱
FIELDS.subtitle: Ichibe-Koji and Kaiseki restaurants.

FIELDS.title: Arayshiyama Bamboo Forest
FIELDS.subtitle: Near the Arashiyama monkey park. Also lots of temples to explore there.

FIELDS.title: Visit Famous Gardens in Kyoto ⛩️
FIELDS.subtitle: Ryoan-ji Temple (Famous Rock Garden). Kinkaku-ji Temple (the golden paviolion).

FIELDS.title: Travel to Koyasan 🚆
FIELDS.subtitle: Take train to Osaka-Namba. Then take a train to Gokurakubashi station.

FIELDS.title: Go to Fudou-in (hotel) 不動院 in Koyasan 🛌
FIELDS.subtitle: Fudou-in is a Shukubo (temple lodging). check in time 15:00 - 18:00. Check out by 10:00.

FIELDS.title: Explore and hike around in Koyasan
FIELDS.subtitle: The whole mountain is full of temples.

FIELDS.title: Eat a Shojin Ryori meal 🍱
FIELDS.subtitle: The whole mountain is full of temples.

FIELDS.title: Go Home!
FIELDS.subtitle: Takes about 3 hours to get from Fudou-in to KIX.  Flight leaves from Osaka KIX at 16:25. Take the bus back to Osaka from Koyasan.
